Ingredients.5: 1  serrano chile pepper, seeded and diced

Ingredients.7: 1 (15 ounce) can HORMEL® Mary Kitchen® Roast Beef Hash

Ingredients.8: 1  canned chipotle chile in adobo sauce, minced, or more to taste

Ingredients.9: 3 tablespoons vegetable oil for frying, or as needed

Directions.1: Heat a skillet over medium heat. Add olive oil. Cook and stir onions and red bell pepper until starting to soften, about 3 minutes. Add corn and serrano pepper; cook 2 to 3 minutes. Add garlic and cook 1 minute more.

Directions.2: Reduce heat to medium-low. Add HORMEL® MARY KITCHEN® Roast Beef Hash and chipotle pepper. Cook until the hash is heated and well mixed with the rest of the ingredients, about 2 or 3 minutes.

Directions.3: Heat tortillas in a skillet, turning once, until they are soft and can be folded without breaking.

Directions.4: Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat.

Directions.5: Spoon 2 tablespoons of the hash filling and 1 1/2 tablespoons of mozzarella cheese on each tortilla. Fold tortillas in half. Fry in vegetable oil until quesadillas are golden and crispy, about 3 minutes on each side. Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate.

Directions.6: Mix cilantro and onions together in a small bowl.

Directions.7: Serve the quesadillas with salsa, sour cream, onions, and cilantro. Enjoy!
